Final Inspection

Fire and Safety, LLC

Our Team

Final Inspection Fire & Safety, LLC, located in Odessa, Texas would like to take this time to graciously introduce ourselves:

"Our senior staff has a combined 30 years experience in the field of Fire and Life Safety Inspections and Training."

The Final Inspection team are Texas Certified Peace Officers and Texas Commission on Fire Protection certified Fire Inspectors.

Final Inspection team provides an assortment of fire inspection related services for homes, businesses, safety trainings for small or large businesses, code consultation for new construction and developments, including outsourcing projects and meeting the needs of growing municipalities and institutions in your community.

"We look forward to working with you to help assist in meeting your specific needs to ensure fire safety in all environments."

Plan Review

Municipalities can contract with us or direct all fees and plan submissions directly to us.

Plan review includes stamp plans with comments and an open line of communication.

Municipalities will receive code compliant plans pertaining to fire protection such as Automatic Sprinkler Systems, Fire Alarm Systems, and Passive Fire Protection for any project without any overhead.

Contact us so we can discuss an arrangement that will work best for your organization.

*Contact us to establish a safe work environment or to ensure compliance with regulatory agencies, local codes, and insurance requirements*

Plan reviews are available for the following disciplines:

• Automatic Sprinkler Systems
• Standpipes
• Fire Alarm Systems
• Hazardous Material Storage
• High Piled Storage
• Kitchen Suppression System
• Clean Agent System
• Fire Apparatus Access Roads
• Residential
• Passive Fire Protection
• Paint Spray Booth
• Commercial Building Plan Reviews for Exit Egress

Training

Fire and Safety is necessary for businesses and companies of every size. The Occupational Safety and Health Administration require all businesses to provide a safe and healthy workplace, and recommends training for all employees. Training not only impacts knowledge and awareness of hazards; it empowers workers to participate in creating and maintaining a safer work environment. We at Final Inspection Fire & Safety, LLC can provide a catered fire safety program that will meet your needs in creating a safe secure working environment.

Inspections

Final Inspection personnel have a plethora of knowledge and experience ensuring code compliance and would like to collaborate with your organizations to further familiarize yourself with House Bill 3866. The Life Code Inspections, Texas Government Code Section 419.908, passed by Texas Legislature in 2009 state the following:

Only an individual certified by the Texas Commission on Fire Protection as a Fire Inspector may conduct a fire safety inspection required by state or local law, rule, regulation or ordinance. In addition, it must be conducted in accordance with:

  • 1. The most recent local fire code
  • 2. The most recent local fire code adopted by the State Fire Marshal.

    • This recently new statue went into effect on September 1, 2011 and further requires all Fire Safety Plan Reviews to be performed by a certified Fire Inspector. New policy and procedures are presently affecting many business organizations in towns and counties including nursing homes, hospitals, day care centers, foster homes, schools, detention centers, prisons, jails, new homes and other buildings that require a Fire Inspection and Certificates of Occupancy.

    To personally request a conference to minimize the complexity of the implied new statute and to explore ways to guarantee Code Compliance maintaining the general safety and well being of all your assets, personnel and customers: ~ Contact Us ~ We look forward to working together in a mutual partnership.
